# Movie Recommendation System
<img src="recommendations.jpg" width="300" />

This project aims to develop a **movie recommendation system** that helps users discover new movies based on their preferences. It uses machine learning techniques to suggest films similar to the ones a user has liked in the past.

---

## Objectives

- Collect and clean movie ratings data
- Analyze user behavior and preferences
- Build a recommendation engine using collaborative filtering
- Design a simple web interface to display recommendations

---

## Tools & Technologies

- **Python** (Pandas, Scikit-learn)
- **Jupyter Notebooks**
- **Streamlit** for the web app interface
- **TMDb API** for movie details

---

## Future Improvements

- Add content-based filtering using genres and keywords  
- Improve UI/UX design for better user interaction  
- Include more user feedback for personalized recommendations
